text: Mamadou Traore (born 3 October 1994) is a Malian footballer who now plays for C.S. Marítimo in Portugal.Mamadou Traore, 22 anos, é o novo reforço do Marítimo B RTP ==Career== Traore started his senior career with Elche CF Ilicitano. After that, he played for SW Florida Adrenaline and Platense. In 2017, he signed for C.S. Marítimo in the Portuguese Primeira Liga, where he has made one appearances and scored zero goals. == References == == External links == * Mamadou Traore, a Malian who already lives as a Honduran * Mamadou Traore, the 'Paul Pogba' from Mali looking for an opportunity in Platense * Mamadou's dream takes shape in Elche Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Malian footballers Category:Malian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Honduras Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Platense F.C. players Category:C.S. Marítimo players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mamadou Traoré (footballer)
